stories.title: Git Hook Enhancement with Full ESLint Validation
stories.description: Update pre-push hook to run full npm run lint, add SKIP_LINT escape hatch. Prevents future ESLint violations from reaching CI.

stories.title: Fix Auto-Fixable ESLint Errors
stories.description: Remove unused imports, dead stores, useless escapes (~60 errors) using eslint --fix. Mechanical changes that reduce error count by 40%.

stories.title: Fix Moderate ESLint Errors (Methods & Promises)
stories.description: Fix unbound methods, promise handling, regex optimizations (~50 errors). Catches real bugs and reduces errors by 34%.

stories.title: Fix Security & Complexity ESLint Errors
stories.description: Replace tmpdir() with TempDirectoryFixture, fix pseudo-random usage, refactor nested complexity (~38 errors). Achieves zero errors and full compliance.
